mapper.insert: insert into t_result_optometry_new ( `student_id`, `checkor_id`, `first_check_vd`, `first_check_rps`, `first_check_lps`, `first_check_rcs`, `first_check_lcs`, `check_date`, `second_check_vd`, `second_check_rps`, `second_check_lps`, `second_check_rcs`, `second_check_lcs`, `delete_flag`, first_check_pd , second_check_pd, activity_id, Relation_Patient_Crf_Id, identity_card ) values ( #{studentId}, #{checkorId}, #{firstCheckVd}, #{firstCheckRps}, #{firstCheckLps}, #{firstCheckRcs}, #{firstCheckLcs}, #{checkDate}, #{secondCheckVd}, #{secondCheckRps}, #{secondCheckLps}, #{secondCheckRcs}, #{secondCheckLcs}, #{deleteFlag}, #{firstCheckPd}, #{secondCheckPd}, #{activityId}, #{RelationPatientCrfId}, #{identityCard} )
mapper.delete:
